languages.text: "{name}..." {n}На лице Хейнрикса появляется легкая улыбка, его напряженные плечи опускаются.{/n} "Я больше ни на секунду не усомнюсь в тебе".
"{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}На лице Хейнрикса появляется легкая улыбка, его напряженные плечи опускаются.{/n} "Я больше ни на секунду не усомнюсь в тебе".

traits.locale_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}さん…」{n}ハインリックスが軽く微笑むと、彼の肩の緊張が解けた。{/n}「もうあなたを疑うことはしない。ほんの一瞬でもだ」
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}さん…」{n}ハインリックスが軽く微笑むと、彼の肩の緊張が解けた。{/n}「もうあなたを疑うことはしない。ほんの一瞬でもだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “{name}……”{n}海因里希微微一笑，紧绷的肩膀放松下来。{/n}“我再也不会怀疑你了，一秒都不会了。”
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."

traits.locale_text: “{name}……”{n}海因里希微微一笑，紧绷的肩膀放松下来。{/n}“我再也不会怀疑你了，一秒都不会了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {name}... » {n}Heinrix esquisse un vague sourire, et la tension dans ses épaules se relâche.{/n} « Je ne douterai plus jamais de vous. Pas une seule seconde. »
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."

traits.locale_text: « {name}... » {n}Heinrix esquisse un vague sourire, et la tension dans ses épaules se relâche.{/n} « Je ne douterai plus jamais de vous. Pas une seule seconde. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «{name}...». {n}Heinrix sonríe levemente y la tensión de sus hombros se esfuma.{/n} «No volveré a dudar nunca de ti. Ni por un momento».
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."

traits.locale_text: «{name}...». {n}Heinrix sonríe levemente y la tensión de sus hombros se esfuma.{/n} «No volveré a dudar nunca de ti. Ni por un momento».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name} ..." {n}Heinrix lächelt, und die Spannung in seinen Schultern lässt nach.{/n} "Ich werde nie wieder an Euch zweifeln. Nicht für eine Sekunde."
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."

traits.locale_text: "{name} ..." {n}Heinrix lächelt, und die Spannung in seinen Schultern lässt nach.{/n} "Ich werde nie wieder an Euch zweifeln. Nicht für eine Sekunde."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix hafifçe gülümsüyor. Omuzlarına yüklenen gerginlik azalıyor.{/n} "Senden bir daha asla şüphelenmeyeceğim. Bir an bile..."
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix smiles lightly, and the tension in his shoulders releases.{/n} "I will never doubt you again. Not for a second."

traits.locale_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix, hafifçe gülümsüyor. Omuzlarına yüklenen gerginlik azalıyor.{/n} "Senden bir daha asla şüphelenmeyeceğim. Bir saniyeliğine bile olsa..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
